function.name: main
function.function-prolog: This function is used as an example in the "Getting Started with STAX" document. It starts the TestProcess, and allows the parms, machine, java_command, java_class, processName, and classpath to be passed as arguments to the function.

function-arg-def.name: parms
function-arg-def.function-arg-description: The three parameters to pass to the process.

function-arg-def.name: machine
function-arg-def.function-arg-description: The name of machine where the test process should run.

function-arg-def.name: java_command
function-arg-def.function-arg-description: The name of java executable that should be used to execute the test process.

function-arg-def.name: java_class
function-arg-def.function-arg-description: The name of java class for the test process.

function-arg-def.name: classpath
function-arg-def.function-arg-description: The CLASSPATH that should be used when the test process is started..
